import gamegridp
from collections import defaultdict


[Doku]class Observer:

[Doku]    def listen(self, event, data):
        pass




[Doku]class EventManager:
    def __init__(self):
        self._observers = defaultdict(list)


[Doku]    def register_observer(self, observer, event):
        self._observers[event].append(observer)



[Doku]    def notify_observers(self, event, data):
        for observer in self._observers[event]:
            observer.listen(event, data)
